column4: Is there a good web editor that will connect to my site using ssh?
i mean server
gedit? :-)
its a headless box, i want to edit the files over ssh
yes,  create a "connect to server" connection via sftp (ssh), and then edit with gedit
how do you do that? I know how to do sftp but dont know how to use it.
so start with the "connect to server" and if you plan to do this alot, i recommend creating a bookmark
thanks man, thats awesome
got it worked out?  cool
yea but i can use xscream... which seems kinda cool.
yea it seems intersting, been using it for 5 seconds... it does other languages too.
u sure thats the name? cant find much other than the thrill ride in vegas :-P
can you link me to its site? if it exists?
i don't think the quattro cards work with the default drivers...
mine works fine, and 177 glx works fine on most of them
sorry, yeah
yea glx-177 supports them
i'm going with you on this
must have been back in the day
well we could check the package information
your right
quadro fx 370 is in there
